title: Minecraft Pocket Edition 0.10.0 Build 8.apk
description:
Build 5 was originally scheduled to be the final testing build before the final release of 0.10.0, but two days ago Build 6 was released. Today Build 7 was released, which had a major bug related to text rendering, thus Build 8 was released shortly afterwards. HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the changelog:

Bugfixes

Fixed an issue with server discovery
Fixed audio remaining muted after switching apps
Can sleep again when connected to a server
The player is now rotated correctly when sleeping

Tweaks

The clouds and the terrain are now tinted red during sunset
Modders can now use shader version 300 if they wish to
Possibly made text rendering (especially non-ASCII) much faster
Added back water sounds
